feed.title: Lake Superior (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Lake Superior (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:23 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 7:00 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Temperature: 1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 71 %
Dewpoint: -2.9°C
Wind: SSW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then snow. Fog patches developing overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries becoming mixed with periods of rain mixed with drizzle in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 2. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. High zero. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow. Windy. High minus 6. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
